Package org.apache.lenya.cms.ac2

Interface Summary
AccessController An access controller allows authenticating and authorizing identities.
AccessControllerResolver An access controller resolver resolves the appropriate access controller for a given Cocoon object model.
Accreditable An Accreditable can be accredited with roles on a certain URI using a Credential.
AccreditableManager  
Authenticator An authenticator.
Authorizer  
Identifiable A marker interface to mark an Accreditable as identifiable.
InheritingPolicyManager  
Policy  
PolicyManager  
 

Class Summary
AbstractAccessControllerResolver  
BypassableAccessController AccessController that can be bypassed for certain URL patterns.
ComposableAccessControllerResolver  
ConfigurableAccessControllerResolver  
Credential A credential assigns a set of Roles to an Accreditable.
DefaultAccessController  
DefaultPolicy A DefaultPolicy is the own policy of a certain URL (not merged).
Identity  
PolicyAuthorizer  
PolicyBuilder  
PublicationAccessControllerResolver Resolves the access controller according to the ac.xconf file of a publication.
URLPolicy A policy at a certain URL.
UserAuthenticator  
World
